bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Big Data Business Security Risk Assessment
IEEE Standard for Big Data Business Security Risk Assessment

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard can be applied to internet-based business scenarios, and can also be served serve as a practical guide to achieve help assess business security risk control through the big data technology. This standard can be applied in other types of organization, including public or privately-owned or state-owned enterprises, associations, or organizations, or by individuals, to improve assessment of their protection capability against business security risks based on big data technology.

This standard can be applied in other types of organization, including public or privately-owned or state-owned enterprises, associations, or organizations, or by individuals, to improve assessment of their protection capability against business security risks based on big data technology.
